item.title: Probelem with ice barrage, pls help
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

i screwed up on the code here this should work

this is the normal barrage

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic); startAnimation(1979); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

this is the huge barrage
i screwed up on the code here this should work

this is the normal barrage

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(370, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic); startAnimation(1979); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

item.title: Probelem with ice barrage, pls help
item.dc:creator: @h3ll_pure h3ll pure
item.description:
@h3ll_pure wrote:

Ok, here goes, I would like barrage to work on players, it works fine on npc’s but on players it messes up ill show you the codes.

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 1; //stillgfx(368, absY, absX); //stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

And,

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((2003*hitDiff), playerMagic); startAnimation(1979); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 200; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

Ok please help me make it work on Players.

Thanks in advance,

H3ll

EDIT: Also when I barrage it comes out like blitz

EDIT2: I stopped it from barrage coming out as blitz but now i cast barrage on an npc and it hits the npc but the barrage goes around me…

Help pls peepz[br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2007, 03:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Pls help

Read full topic
